statements: SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 1;

SELECT user_id, name, role FROM UserProfiles WHERE drone_operator = TRUE ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE maintenance_personnel = FALSE AND role = 'Admin' ORDER BY user_id DESC;

SELECT user_id, name, role FROM UserProfiles WHERE role LIKE '%Personnel%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
